content: shark time pouch designed by tamara kelly 2012 all rights reserved https //www mooglyblog com/shark-time-pouch/ fan of discovery s shark week® know a kid who loves sea creatures need something to perk up your own shark week this pouch is just the right size for pencils markers… etc take a bite out of organization or at least put a very toothy grin on your face materials us g/6 hook 4 25 mm 2 black buttons or toy/doll eyes main color 100 yards of sport or 6″ white zipper worsted weight gray yarn any fiber 7″ x 1″ piece of white felt gill slit color 2 yards of sport or worsted weight darker gray yarn any fiber helpful video tutorials thread gray to match main color black magic_ring and white a few yards of each seamless join copyright tamara kelly 2012 all rights reserved this written pattern is for personal use by the purchaser only and not to be copied or distributed you are welcome to sell items made from this pattern instructions body main color row 8 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across turn 19 single_crochet for the body the pattern starts by working in the round then switches to row 9 ch1 single_crochet in the next 7 sts single_crochet 2 in row then back to working in the the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 sts round for the sake of continuity both turn 21 single_crochet rounds and row will be referred to as row here and the work is turned at the row 10 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across turn end of each 21 single_crochet row 1 rs using the magic_ring work row 11 ch1 single_crochet in the next 8 sts single_crochet 2 in 6sc into the ring join with a slip_stitch and the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 sts turn 6 single_crochet turn 23 single_crochet row 2 ws ch1 single_crochet in the next st single_crochet 2 row 12 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across turn in the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and 23 single_crochet turn 9 single_crochet row 13 ch1 single_crochet in the next 9 sts single_crochet 2 in row 3 ch1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts single_crochet 2 in the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 sts the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn 25 single_crochet turn 12 single_crochet row 14 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across turn row 4 ch1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts single_crochet 2 in 25 single_crochet the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn 15 single_crochet row 15 ch1 single_crochet in the next 10 sts single_crochet 2 in the next st 2 times single_crochet in the next 3 row 5 ch1 single_crochet in the next 4 sts single_crochet 2 in sts turn 27 single_crochet the next st 3 times join with slip_stitch and turn 18 single_crochet row 16 ch1 and single_crochet evenly across chain 9 and join with slip_stitch to first st of row
